meanings.def: the act of protecting somebody/something from attack, criticism, etc.
examples: in defense of somebody/something soldiers who died in defense of their country
What points can be raised in defense of this argument?
in somebody's defense I have to say in her defense that she knew nothing about it beforehand.
When her brother was criticized she leapt to his defense.
leap/spring/jump/rush to the defense of somebody/something

meanings.def: something that provides protection against attack from enemies, the weather, illness, etc.
examples: They are responsible for maintaining coastal flood defenses.
At this point the country had no effective air defenses.
defense against something The town walls were built as a defense against enemy attacks.
a new missile defense system (= for defense against missiles)
The body has natural defense mechanisms to protect it from disease.

meanings.def: the organization of the people and systems that are used by a government to protect a country from attack
examples: (US English) the Department of Defense
(British English) the Ministry of Defence
Issues of national defense are a matter for the government.
Further cuts in defense spending are being considered.

meanings.def: something that is said or written in order to support something
examples: a defense of Marxism

meanings.def: what is said in court to prove that a person did not commit a crime; the act of presenting this argument in court
examples: Her defense was that she was somewhere completely different at the time of the crime.
He wanted to conduct his own defense.
The judge rejected her insanity defense.

meanings.def: the lawyer or lawyers whose job is to prove in court that a person did not commit a crime
examples: The defense requested more time to prepare their case.
the defense lawyer/counsel/attorney
a witness for the defense

meanings.def: the players who must prevent the other team from scoring; the position of these players on the sports field
examples: Lattimore cut through the defense for a 52-yard touchdown.
on defense (North American English) She plays on defense.
in defence (British English) She plays in defence.

meanings.def: a contest, game, etc. in which the previous winner or winners compete in order to try to win again
examples: Osaka begins her defense of the US Open title.
